about_the_game:
Sharkarma tells the gripping story of Karam and his friends as their ocean-sailing adventure takes an unexpected and sinister turn. What begins as a quest for discovery, in Part 1, soon transforms into a harrowing lesson on the inescapable power of karma (Part 2).

When Karam stumbles upon a secret that will forever change him—and could spell doom for the entire crew—their fate becomes a chilling reflection of the consequences of human actions on nature.

Supported by leading ocean conservation NGOs dedicated to fighting shark finning and preserving marine ecosystems, Sharkarma is not only an intensely suspenseful experience, but also a powerful commentary on environmental responsibility.

Directed by Cinzia Angelini and featuring original music by Grammy and Academy Award-winning songwriter Diane Warren, Sharkarma is the first cinematic-grade CG short film created exclusively for 6DoF VR, pushing the boundaries of immersive storytelling.

With a groundbreaking combination of visual quality and innovative editing styles, it delivers a uniquely suspenseful experience that merges the themes of karma, ecological impact, and terror.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes frightening scenes; psychological horror along with violent and gory content
